name: Taric
title: the Shield of Valoran

skins.name: Armor of the Fifth Age Taric

lore: Taric is the Aspect of the Protector, wielding incredible power as Runeterra's guardian of life, love, and beauty. Shamed by a dereliction of duty and exiled from his homeland Demacia, Taric ascended Mount Targon to find redemption, only to discover a higher calling among the stars. Imbued with the might of ancient Targon, the Shield of Valoran now stands ever vigilant against the insidious corruption of the Void.
blurb: Taric is the Aspect of the Protector, wielding incredible power as Runeterra's guardian of life, love, and beauty. Shamed by a dereliction of duty and exiled from his homeland Demacia, Taric ascended Mount Targon to find redemption, only to discover a...
allytips: The cooldown reducing component of Bravado makes Cooldown Reduction items like Frozen Heart, Iceborn Gauntlet, and Spirit Visage exceptionally powerful on Taric.
Using Starlight's Touch at lower charges makes its healing less Mana efficient, but can greatly increase Taric's sustained damage via Bravado.
Rather than saving Cosmic Radiance for the last moment and risking someone dying during the delay, it can be more beneficial to cast it as soon as you know a teamfight is guaranteed to start.
enemytips: Taric's ultimate, Cosmic Radiance, has a long delay before its effect. Try to quickly assess whether to disengage the fight or attempt to kill his allies before it goes off.
Taric reduces his spell cooldowns by basic attacking enemies with Bravado. Try to kite him in teamfights and punish him for approaching the minion wave in lane.

riot_spell_q.name: Starlight's Touch
riot_spell_q.description: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Spends all charges to heal nearby allied champions for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}% of maximum Health) per charge, up to {{ e5 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) at maximum charges.
Maximum charges: {{ e6 }}

Bravado-empowered attacks grant 1 charge of Starlight's Touch.

riot_spell_w.name: Bastion
riot_spell_w.description:
Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion.

Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Taric's spells will also cast from a nearby ally protected by Bastion.

Passive: Bastion increases Armor by {{ f1 }} ({{ e1 }}% of Taric's Armor).

Active: Blesses an ally with Bastion and shields them for {{ e2 }}% of their maximum Health for {{ e3 }} seconds. Bastion lasts on the target until a new one is chosen.

riot_spell_e.name: Dazzle
riot_spell_e.description: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.
riot_spell_e.tooltip: Readies a beam of starlight that, after {{ e3 }} second, deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> <scaleArmor>(+{{ f1 }})</scaleArmor> magic damage and stuns enemies for {{ e2 }} second(s).

riot_spell_r.name: Cosmic Radiance
riot_spell_r.description: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.
riot_spell_r.tooltip: After a {{ initialdelay }} second delay, pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions, making them invulnerable for {{ invulnduration }} seconds.

riot_spell_i.name: Bravado
riot_spell_i.description: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Bravado
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} After casting an ability, '''Taric's''' next two [[basic attack]]s within 4 seconds gain {{sti|as|{{as|100% '''total''' attack speed}}}}, each dealing {{pp|25 to 93}} {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' armor)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} and reducing the {{sti|cooldown|cooldowns}} of his basic abilities by {{tt|1 second|Affected by cooldown reduction.}}.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* The attacks will apply [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
** {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} do not interact with ''Bravado's'' bonus damage.
* The empowered attacks will not apply the bonus damage against structures but will reduce ''Taric's'' cooldowns.
* The empowered basic attacks can be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} but will still reduce '''Taric's''' cooldowns.
** {{pending for test}} {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parry}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|block}} or if Taric is affected by  {{tip|blind}} .

wikia_skill_q1.name: Starlight's Touch
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Taric''' stores a charge of ''Starlight's Touch'' periodically, up to a maximum at once. {{ai|Bravado|Taric}} empowered attacks grant one charge.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taric''' {{tip|heals}} himself and all nearby allied champions for 30 {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|(+ 1% of Taric's '''maximum''' health)}} per stored charge at the time of cast, up to a maximum of 150 {{as|(+ 100% AP)}} {{as|(+ 5% of Taric's '''maximum''' health)}} at 5 charges.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Bastion
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion. Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Taric''' gains {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and links to his ally. While linked, the {{as|'''bonus''' armor}} and '''Taric's''' abilities are replicated on the ally, though the effects do not stack.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taric''' {{tip|shields}} himself and the target allied champion for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, blessing them with the ''Bastion'' link.
wikia_skill_w1.description3: '''Taric''' can self-cast ''Bastion'' to shield himself, or to the nearest unlinked ally in range. Only one champion can be marked at a time, and selecting a new ally clears the previous mark.
wikia_skill_w1.notes: * Linked allies will keep continuing {{ai|Bastion}}, {{ai|Dazzle}}, and {{ai|Cosmic Radiance}} even if '''Taric''' is not in {{tt|range|by death or 1300 units}}.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Dazzle
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taric''' projects a beam of starlight towards the target location, erupting after a 1 second delay, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
wikia_skill_e1.notes: * ''Dazzle'' will aim toward Taric's cursor on-cast when firing from both his and his {{ai|Bastion 2|Taric|Bastion's}} positions.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Cosmic Radiance
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|2.5}}-second delay, cosmic energy descends upon '''Taric''' and all nearby allied champions, rendering them {{tip|invulnerability|invulnerable}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.notes: * All affected units can still be affected with {{tip|crowd control}}.
